Change.Title: CannyEdgeDetector method SetThreshold method is removed.
Change.Description:
The itkCannyEdgeDetector no longer has a SetThreshold methods (deprecated in ITK 2.2)
There is now SetUpperThreshold and SetLowerThreshold. To get the old behavior, replace SetThreshold with SetUpperthreshold, and add SetLowerThreshold(GetUpperThreshold()*0.5).
